name: homebuddy
description: UrbanCare is your all-in-one home services app designed to make city living simpler and more comfortable. Whether you need a spotless kitchen, a repaired faucet, or a perfectly maintained garden, UrbanCare connects you with trusted professionals — quickly and reliably.
author: Team Care
main: bathroom, kitchen) to repairs (carpentry, plumbing) and gardening, UrbanCare ensures that every corner of your home gets the care it deserves. With a clean design, easy booking, and verified experts, UrbanCare delivers convenience, quality, and trust right to your doorstep.
